job description:
Job Title: Associate Scientist
Location: West Point - PA 19486
Duration: 12 Months contract
Shift:M-F(8am-5pm)

Qualifications:

· A BS degree or equivalent in microbiology or a related field is required.
· A minimal 1 year hands-on experience in cell culture and cell based assay (such as viral plaque assays) in academic or biopharmaceutical industry settings is also required.
· The successful candidate should show ability to work independently, follow procedures precisely, and generate analytical data consistently.
· Good communication skills are required.

Responsibilities:

· Looking for a highly motivated individual who will support the analytical testing for vaccine development.
· This involves the chemical labeling of biological samples, cell based assay performance, and data analysis.
· This individual needs to ensure that the analytical results are of high quality and all work is documented in a clear, concise and timely manner.
· This individual will perform assay qualification and robustness experiments as needed.
